content.text:
# Analysis of Target Structure

## Description of the Main Target Image
The target structure appears to be a simple toy car or vehicle with the following characteristics:

- Count & Layers: The structure has a total of 7 blocks arranged in 3 main layers:
  * Bottom layer: 2 orange cylindrical blocks serving as wheels
  * Middle layer: 3 yellow rectangular blocks forming the base/platform
  * Top layer: 1 red rectangular block with an arch tunnel and 1 orange triangular block as the roof

- Spatial Relationships:
  * The two orange cylindrical wheels are positioned horizontally, parallel to each other at the bottom
  * Three yellow rectangular blocks are placed on top of the wheels, forming a flat platform
  * A red arched block (with a tunnel opening) sits on top of the yellow platform
  * An orange triangular block is positioned on top of the red block as a roof

## Required Blocks from the Dictionary
Based on the analysis, I need the following blocks:

1. Block #12 - Horizontal orange cylinder (left wheel)
2. Block #12 - Horizontal orange cylinder (right wheel, same block used twice)
3. Block #7 - Horizontal yellow rectangular block (front of platform)
4. Block #10 - Horizontal yellow rectangular block (middle of platform)
5. Block #7 - Horizontal yellow rectangular block (rear of platform, same as front)
6. Block #1 - Red rectangular block with arch/tunnel
7. Block #15 - Orange triangular block (roof)

## Assembly Order
```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 12
   Step2: Move block with index 12
   Step3: Move block with index 7
   Step4: Move block with index 10
   Step5: Move block with index 7
   Step6: Move block with index 1
   Step7: Move block with index 15
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with the wheels as the foundation, builds the yellow platform on top, adds the red arched block, and finally places the triangular roof to complete the structure.
